code: import{motion,useAnimation}from"framer-motion";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import events from"../events";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var HomeNavbarDown=["demo style 1","demo style 2","demo style 3"];var Paths=["/","/home2","/home3"];var NavbarHome=function NavbarHome(_ref){var controller=_ref.controller;var controllers={0:useAnimation(),1:useAnimation(),2:useAnimation()};var location=useLocation().pathname;var isHere=function isHere(e){e=Paths[e];if(e===location)return true;else return false;};Paths.forEach(function(e,i){if(e===location)controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().sColor});else controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().wColor});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"dropDown",animate:controller,whileHover:{opacity:1},children:HomeNavbarDown.map(function(e,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:Paths[i],className:"dropDownItem",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.span,{className:"span",onHoverStart:function onHoverStart(){if(!isHere(i)){controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().sColor});}},onHoverEnd:function onHoverEnd(){if(!isHere(i)){controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().wColor});}},animate:controllers[i],transition:{duration:0.3},children:e})},i);})});};export default NavbarHome;
